column2: Best natural light: 07:05 AM to 05:50 PM (11.0 hours total)
Morning ventilation: Open windows 07:05 AM - 11:20 AM before heat builds
Evening ventilation: Re-open windows after 02:20 PM when heat subsides
Peak heat at 12:20 PM (780 W/m²). Close blinds 11:20 AM - 02:20 PM
Morning sun 07:05 AM: Ideal for plants needing gentle light
